Ingredients.3: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen soy burger-style crumbles

Ingredients.4: 1 (28 ounce) can whole tomatoes, drained, 1/4 cup juice reserved

Ingredients.9: 1 (14.25 ounce) can vegetarian refried beans, divided

Ingredients.10: 2  fresh jalapeno peppers - seeded, sliced, and divided

Directions.1: In a saucepan bring water to a boil. Add rice and stir. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.3: Place soy crumbles, tomatoes, reserved tomato juice, chili powder, cumin, and taco seasoning in a medium frying pan over medium high heat. Cook and stir, breaking up tomatoes, for 10 minutes.

Directions.4: Lay 1 flour tortilla in a lightly greased 8x8 inch baking dish. Layer with one half of the beans, jalapeno slices, rice, salsa, soy mixture, and 1 cup Cheddar cheese. Repeat layers with remaining ingredients, beginning with the flour tortilla, and top with remaining 1 1/2 cups Cheddar cheese.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until heated through and cheese is melted. Serve immediately.
